thread.section_title: macs4u.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of macs4u.com | www.macs4u.com
thread.title: Jessica

author: Jessica
title: Jessica
text: It was shipping in a timely manner and pretty good condition. I have had no issues using it thus far with the exception of the charger that was provided. It is very temperamental when it comes to charging. The charger isn't covered by the warranty, so I will eventually have to spring for a new one instead of playing the will you charge today game. (It is not the laptop from what I can tell, I am almost certain it is the charger.)
